product_name: FCS All Tech Instant Repair Putty
long_description: A quick fix to repair small dings and get you back on the water, the FCS All Tech Instant Repair Putty works with epoxy and polyethylene paddleboards and surfboards. Cures under water; includes detailed instructions.
short_description: A quick fix to repair small dings and get you back on the water, the FCS All Tech Instant Repair Putty works with epoxy and polyethylene paddleboards and surfboards.
